component.name: qFlipper
component.summary: Graphical desktop application for updating Flipper Zero firmware via PC

description.p: Graphical desktop application for updating Flipper Zero firmware via PC qFlipper is completely open source and based on Qt framework. Runs on Windows, macOS, Linux.

ul.li: Update Flipper's firmware and supplemental data with a press of one button
Stream Flipper's display and control it remotely
Backup and restore settings, progress and pairing data

description.p: You probably only need to install this application if you are having problems with your laptop battery, or are trying to work out what programs are using significant amounts of power.

ul.li: Provide region data to SubGhz application. You know the rules and so do I.
Fixed typos and changed text messages.
There is anecdotal evidence that libusb 1.0.26 causes more crashes than usual on MacOS. Reverted to 1.0.24 until a proper fix will be available.
